code: var localhost="http://localhost:8000";var apiURL="/api";export var endpoint="".concat(localhost).concat(apiURL);export var productListURL="".concat(endpoint,"/products/");export var productDetailURL=function productDetailURL(id){return"".concat(endpoint,"/products/").concat(id,"/");};export var addToCartURL="".concat(endpoint,"/add-to-cart/");export var orderSummaryURL="".concat(endpoint,"/order-summary/");export var checkoutURL="".concat(endpoint,"/checkout/");export var addCouponURL="".concat(endpoint,"/add-coupon/");export var countryListURL="".concat(endpoint,"/countries/");export var userIDURL="".concat(endpoint,"/user-id/");export var addressListURL=function addressListURL(addressType){return"".concat(endpoint,"/addresses/?address_type=").concat(addressType);};export var addressCreateURL="".concat(endpoint,"/addresses/create/");export var addressUpdateURL=function addressUpdateURL(id){return"".concat(endpoint,"/addresses/").concat(id,"/update/");};export var addressDeleteURL=function addressDeleteURL(id){return"".concat(endpoint,"/addresses/").concat(id,"/delete/");};export var orderItemDeleteURL=function orderItemDeleteURL(id){return"".concat(endpoint,"/order-items/").concat(id,"/delete/");};export var orderItemUpdateQuantityURL="".concat(endpoint,"/order-item/update-quantity/");export var paymentListURL="".concat(endpoint,"/payments/");export var userDetailsURL="".concat(endpoint,"/userdetails/");
